column2: University of the West of Scotland
column5: As events are increasingly recognised as a tool for stimulating economic development, the industry is quickly professionalising and requires a growing number of graduates to form an educated, critically informed workforce.Our new MSc in International Events Management course is designed to meet this demand.It will accommodate the demand for talented, capable practitioners, preparing you for a successful career in events management at home or abroad.Our course will enable you to develop your practical, strategic and conceptual understanding of the events sector within local, national and international contexts.
column9: 1-2 years full time, 3 years part time
